description: Detects tampering with attachment manager settings policies associations to lower the default file type risks (See reference for more information)
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Potential Attachment Manager Settings Associations Tamper
query: (winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Pp][Oo][Ll][Ii][Cc][Ii][Ee][Ss]\\[Aa][Ss][Ss][Oo][Cc][Ii][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Ss]\\.*/ AND (((winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\[Dd][Ee][Ff][Aa][Uu][Ll][Tt][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Tt][Yy][Pp][Ee][Rr][Ii][Ss][Kk]/ AND winlog.event_data.Details:/[Dd][Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\ \(0[Xx]00006152\)/)) OR ((winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\[Ll][Oo][Ww][Rr][Ii][Ss][Kk][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Tt][Yy][Pp][Ee][Ss]/ AND winlog.event_data.Details:(/.*\.[Zz][Ii][Pp]\;.*/ OR /.*\.[Rr][Aa][Rr]\;.*/ OR /.*\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]\;.*/ OR /.*\.[Bb][Aa][Tt]\;.*/ OR /.*\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]\;.*/ OR /.*\.[Cc][Mm][Dd]\;.*/ OR /.*\.[Rr][Ee][Gg]\;.*/ OR /.*\.[Mm][Ss][Ii]\;.*/ OR /.*\.[Hh][Tt][Mm]\;.*/ OR /.*\.[Hh][Tt][Mm][Ll]\;.*/)))))
